text.text_translated: The Hunger Games is an event that happens every year. The Capitol uses it to punish the districts for fighting against them in the past. Every year, one boy and one girl are chosen from each district. They are between the ages of 12 and 18. They are chosen by lottery to compete in a battle. Only one person can survive. The chosen teenagers are called **tributes**. Tributes are the people selected to fight in the games. The whole country must watch the event on TV.
